Special Leave to Appeal was granted on the following questions:

column2: Did the Court of Appeal err in refusing the declaration of title to the Appellant in
respect of the 1/8th share in terms of Deed marked P2?
Did the Court of Appeal err in coming to a finding that the Appellant has failed to
prove the due execution of the Deed marked P2?
In any event can the Appellant seek relief by way of ejectment of the Respondent
in view of the interests of the Respondent as contained in terms of Deed P3?
